text: Allakh prinimayet raskayaniye i miloserdno proshchayet tekh, kto postoyanno veruyet v Nego. No u tekh, kotoryye otreklis' ot Yego Istiny, posle togo kak uverovali, potom usililis' neveriyem i povredili veruyushchim, Allakh Vsevyshniy ne primet pokayaniya, potomu chto ikh pokayaniye ne mozhet byt' iskrennim. Poistine, oni soznatel'no zabludilis' i otklonilis' ot pryamogo puti Allakha
